text: Bad Seeds () is a Canadian comedy film, directed by Louis Bélanger and released in 2016. The film stars Alexis Martin as Jacques, a struggling actor from Montreal who is forced to flee the city because of his unpaid gambling debts to a loan shark (Luc Picard), and ends up a partner with Simon (Gilles Renaud) and Francesca (Emmanuelle Lussier-Martinez) in a marijuana farm. The film's cast also includes Myriam Côté, Patrick Hivon, Stéphane Jacques, Yves Bélanger, Bénédicte Décary, François Papineau, Sylvio Archambault and Gary Boudreault. ==Accolades== The film garnered four nominations at the 5th Canadian Screen Awards in 2017, including Best Motion Picture. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" |- ! scope="col"| Award ! scope="col"| Date of ceremony ! scope="col"| Category ! scope="col"| Recipient(s) ! scope="col"| Result ! scope="col" class="unsortable"| |- !scope="row" rowspan=4| Canadian Screen Awards |rowspan=4|12 March 2017 | Best Motion Picture | Luc Vandal and Lorraine Dufour | |style="text-align:center;" rowspan=4| |- |Best Editing | Claude Palardy | |- |Best Art Direction / Production Design | André-Line Beauparlant | |- |Best Overall Sound | Marcel Chouinard, Philippe Lavigne, Stéphane Bergeron, Shaun-Nicholas Gallagher and Louis Collin | |- !scope="row" rowspan=9| Prix Iris |rowspan=9|4 June 2017 | Best Film | Luc Vandal and Lorraine Dufour | |style="text-align:center;" rowspan=9| |- | Best Director | Louis Bélanger | |- | Best Screenplay | Louis Bélanger and Alexis Martin | |- | Best Supporting Actress | Emmanuelle Lussier-Martinez | |- | Best Supporting Actor | Luc Picard | |- | Best Casting | Emanuelle Beaugrand-Champagne and Nathalie Boutrie | |- | Best Music | Guy Bélanger | |- | Best Costume Design | Sophie Lefebvre | |- | Public Prize | Louis Bélanger | |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2016 films Category:2016 comedy films Category:Canadian films Category:Canadian films about cannabis Category:Canadian comedy films Category:Quebec films Category:Films directed by Louis Bélanger
title: Bad Seeds (2016 film)
